A fulltime station would operate an average of 18 hours daily, or 6570 hours during the year. WNYC is licensed to operate only until
the time of sunset in Minneapolis, where another station on our frequency is located. The FCC has granted WNYC special serv.ce author.aat.on
to operate until 10 P.M. E.S.T.
